common.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this?

page.title: Choose Your Plan
page.subtitle: Start free and upgrade as you grow. All plans include a 14-day money-back guarantee.
page.footer: All prices in USD. Cancel anytime.

descriptions.free: Perfect for getting started with basic meal planning
descriptions.plus: Great for home cooks who want more features
descriptions.pro: For serious meal planners who want it all

stripe.description: Pay securely with credit or debit card

groceries.title: Groceries
groceries.description: Track your grocery purchases and manage your inventory.

empty.title: No groceries added yet
empty.description: Start tracking your grocery purchases by adding items manually or importing from a receipt.

inventory.title: Grocery Inventory
inventory.description: Manage all your grocery items in one place.

archive.title: Archived Items
archive.description: View and manage your archived grocery items.

empty.title: No archived items
empty.description: Archived grocery items will appear here. Use the archive action on items you want to store for reference.

analysis.title: Spending Analysis
analysis.description: Understand your grocery spending patterns and habits.
analysis.noStoreData: No store data available. Add stores when recording groceries.

empty.title: No data for analysis
empty.description: Start adding groceries to see spending patterns, shopping habits, and more.

history.title: Purchase History
history.description: Analyze your grocery shopping patterns over time.
history.noData: No historical data available for this period.

empty.title: No history data
empty.description: Start adding groceries to build your purchase history and see trends over time.

form.addDescription: Add a new item to your grocery inventory.
form.editDescription: Update the details of your grocery item.

bulkForm.description: Add multiple grocery items at once. Fill in the details for each item.

waste.dialogDescriptionBulk: Mark {count, plural, one {# item} other {# items}} as wasted. These items will be archived.

tab.title: Waste
tab.description: Track food waste and get tips to reduce it.

analytics.noSuggestions: Start tracking waste to get personalized tips.
analytics.noWasteData: No waste data yet. Items marked as wasted will appear here.

empty.title: No wasted items
empty.description: That's great! You haven't wasted any food yet. Keep it up!

moveToPantry.title: Move to Pantry
moveToPantry.dialogDescription: Move "{name}" to your pantry. The grocery item will be archived.
moveToPantry.dialogDescriptionBulk: Move {count, plural, one {# item} other {# items}} to your pantry. These grocery items will be archived.
moveToPantry.locationHint: Choose where you'll store these items at home.
moveToPantry.moveExplanation: Items will be moved from Groceries to Pantry. The original grocery entries will be archived to avoid duplication.
moveToPantry.bulkSuccess: {count, plural, one {# item} other {# items}} moved to pantry

selectMethod.title: Choose Import Method
selectMethod.description: Select how you want to add items

deliveryApp.title: Delivery App
deliveryApp.description: Upload a screenshot from delivery app

barcode.title: Barcode Scanner
barcode.description: Scan product barcodes to add items

photoPantry.title: Photo of Pantry
photoPantry.description: Take photos of items in your pantry, fridge, or freezer

appScreenshot.title: App Screenshot
appScreenshot.description: Upload a screenshot from another app

photoEquipment.title: Photo of Equipment
photoEquipment.description: Take photos of kitchen equipment and appliances

text.title: Text Import
text.description: Type or paste your grocery list in any format. AI will parse and structure it for you.
text.placeholder:
Enter your groceries here...
Example:
2 kg apples 89.50₴
1l milk from Silpo
bread, eggs, cheese
text.groceryExample:
2 kg apples 89.50₴
1l milk from Silpo
bread, eggs, cheese
500g ground beef 189.99₴
organic bananas x4
1 loaf sourdough bread
yogurt - strawberry flavor
2L orange juice
text.pantryPlaceholder:
Enter your pantry items here...
Example:
2 kg rice in pantry
1 bottle olive oil
milk in fridge
text.pantryExample:
2 kg rice in pantry
1 bottle olive oil
milk in fridge
butter - expires Dec 15
3 cans tomatoes
frozen vegetables in freezer
cheese, eggs, yogurt
spice: cumin, paprika, oregano
text.equipmentPlaceholder:
Enter your kitchen equipment here...
Example:
Cast iron skillet - Lodge
KitchenAid stand mixer
Chef's knife 8 inch
text.equipmentExample:
Cast iron skillet - Lodge, good condition
KitchenAid stand mixer model KSM150
8 inch chef's knife - needs sharpening
Instant Pot 6qt
Stainless steel pot set
Cutting board - bamboo
Food processor - Cuisinart

hints.title: Tips for best results
hints.hint1: Include quantities and units when possible
hints.hint2: Mention prices if you want to track spending
hints.hint3: Add store names if you shop at multiple places

voice.title: Voice Import
voice.description: Record your grocery list by speaking. AI will transcribe and parse it.

hints.title: Tips for best results
hints.hint1: Speak clearly and at a moderate pace
hints.hint3: Works with English, Russian, and Ukrainian

photo.dragOrClick: Drag & drop or click to upload
photo.dragOrClickMultiple: Drag & drop or click to upload multiple photos
photo.maxSizeMultiple: Max {size} MB per file, up to {maxFiles} files
photo.autoCompress: Large photos (HEIC, etc.) will be automatically compressed
photo.compressingDescription: Optimizing image size for faster upload
photo.filesSelected: {count, plural, one {# file selected} other {# files selected}}

errors.tooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is {maxSize} MB
errors.invalidType: Invalid file type. Please upload an image
errors.processingFailed: Failed to process image. Please try again.

groceries.title: Photo of Groceries
groceries.description: Take a photo of your groceries laid out on a table or counter
groceries.descriptionMultiple: Take multiple photos of your groceries from different angles
groceries.hint1: Lay items flat with labels visible
groceries.hint3: Take multiple photos if items don't fit in one frame

paperReceipt.title: Paper Receipt
paperReceipt.description: Take a clear photo of your paper receipt
paperReceipt.descriptionMultiple: Take multiple photos if the receipt is long or hard to capture in one shot
paperReceipt.hint1: Flatten the receipt before taking photo
paperReceipt.hint3: Take multiple photos for long receipts

digitalReceipt.title: Digital Receipt
digitalReceipt.description: Upload a screenshot of your digital receipt or email
digitalReceipt.hint1: Include the full list of items

deliveryApp.title: Delivery App Screenshot
deliveryApp.description: Upload a screenshot from your grocery delivery app
deliveryApp.descriptionMultiple: Upload multiple screenshots from your grocery delivery app
deliveryApp.hint3: Upload multiple screenshots if your order spans multiple pages

shoppingList.title: Handwritten Shopping List
shoppingList.description: Take a photo of your handwritten shopping list
shoppingList.descriptionMultiple: Take multiple photos of your handwritten shopping list
shoppingList.hint3: Flatten the paper before taking photo

screenshot.title: Screenshot
screenshot.description: Upload a screenshot from Notes, Reminders, or another app
screenshot.hint1: Include the full list of items

pantry.title: Photo of Pantry Items
pantry.description: Take a photo of items in your pantry, fridge, or freezer
pantry.descriptionMultiple: Take multiple photos of items in different storage locations
pantry.hint2: Take photos of different shelves or sections

paperList.title: Handwritten List
paperList.description: Take a photo of your handwritten list
paperList.descriptionMultiple: Take multiple photos of your handwritten list
paperList.hint3: Flatten the paper before taking photo

equipment.title: Photo of Equipment
equipment.description: Take a photo of your kitchen equipment
equipment.descriptionMultiple: Take multiple photos of different equipment
equipment.hint1: Take photos with equipment labels visible
equipment.hint2: Include multiple items in one photo when possible
equipment.hint3: Take photos of both front and brand labels

digitalReceipt.title: Digital Receipt Link
digitalReceipt.description: Paste a link to your digital receipt and AI will extract the items
digitalReceipt.otherServices: Other receipt services may also work

errors.processingFailed: Failed to parse receipt. Please check the URL and try again.

hints.title: Tips for best results
hints.hint1: Copy the full receipt URL from your email or SMS
hints.hint2: Make sure the link is still valid (not expired)
hints.hint3: Works with most Ukrainian supermarket digital receipts

barcode.title: Barcode Scanner
barcode.description: Point your camera at a product barcode to look up item details
barcode.notFoundDescription: Barcode {barcode} was not found in the database. You can add it manually.
barcode.scannedItems: {count, plural, one {# item} other {# items}} scanned
barcode.permissionDenied: Camera permission was denied. Please enable camera access to use the barcode scanner.

hints.title: Tips for scanning
hints.hint1: Hold the barcode steady in good lighting
hints.hint2: Keep the barcode centered in the viewfinder
hints.hint3: Works with EAN, UPC, and most product barcodes

review.title: Review Items
review.description: Review and edit parsed items before adding them to your inventory

review.noItems: No items were parsed. Please try again with different input.
review.saveError: Failed to save items. Please try again.
review.addToGroceries: Add {count, plural, one {# item} other {# items}} to Groceries

complete.title: Import Complete!
complete.description: {count, plural, one {# item has} other {# items have}} been added to your groceries
